HTTP server with handlers.description: HTTP Server example with error, logs and static handler.

Exception block.description: Rescue any exception and access the rescued exception using exception variable in the rescue clause.

Exception block with ensure.description: Rescue with ensure clause executed at the end, expression regardless of whether an exception was raised or not.

Exception block with else.description: An else clause is executed only if no exceptions were rescued.

Exception block with else and ensure.description: Exception block with ensure and else.

Module definition.description: Module as namespaces for defining other types, methods and constants or as partial types that can be mixed in other types.

Class definition.description: A class is a blueprint from which individual objects are created. Class names, and indeed all type names, begin with a capital letter in Crystal.

Class definition with initialize.description: Use initialize method as constructor for a class instance.

method definition.description: Method names begin with a lowercase letter and, as a convention, only use lowercase letters, underscores and numbers.

Struct definition.description: Struct allocates it on the stack instead of the heap and  is passed by value.

Union definition.description: Allocates the union on the stack.

Enum definition.description: An enum is a set of integer values, where each value has an associated name.

Lib definition.description: A lib declaration groups C functions and types that belong to a library.

fun definition.description: A fun declaration is a primitive function that support primitive types only and inside a lib binds to a C function.

macro definition.description: Macros are methods that receive AST nodes at compile-time and produce code that is pasted into a program.

if.description: An if evaluates the given branch if its condition is truthy.

if else.description: It evaluates if when condition is true and the else branch when condition is false.

if elsif.description: To write a chain of if-else-if you use elsif.

if elsif else.description: Add elif and else to conditional structure.

unless.description: That is, it behaves in the opposite way of an if.

until loop.description: An until is just syntax sugar for a while with the condition negate.

while loop.description: A while executes its body as long as its condition is truthy.

loop.description: A loop executes its body forever until a break.

spawn.description: A loop executes its body forever until a break.

case.description: A case is a control expression which functions a bit like pattern matching.
